name: inactive small hammer walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a small clamp and a jackhammer. small spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

name: inactive small wrecking walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a motor, a set of chains, and a menacing bludgeon. small spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

name: inactive small saw walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with several motors and nasty saws. small spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

name: inactive small drill walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a small clamp, meant to hold prey into several powerful drills. small spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

name: inactive small blade walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a small, sharp blade attached to heavy duty flexible material, pulled taut by a powerful motor and held by heavy-duty pins..

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a massive hydraulic jaw. small spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a massive hydraulic flame. small spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

name: inactive small exterminator walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with tanks of insecticidal gas and powerful pincers. small spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

name: inactive small flash walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with several hoses attached to a small tank of flash and powerful pincers. small spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.
